allow: Bash(for f in src/ai/openai/responsesAPI.ts src/ai/openai/chatCompletion.ts src/ai/openai/createStreamingRequest.ts src/ai/ollama/createGenerationRequest.ts src/ai/ollama/createStreamingRequest.ts src/ai/gemini/createGenerationRequest.ts src/ai/gemini/createStreamingRequest.ts src/ai/anthropic/createGenerationRequest.ts src/ai/anthropic/createStreamingRequest.ts)
Bash(do sed -i '' 's|import { TracingContext } from ""../../recorder/recorder.js"";|import type { TracingContext } from ""../../tracer/types.js"";|g' "$f")
